insert into score_grade_physical ( ID, STUDENT_ID, GRADE, RESULT, PROJECT_ID, POSITION_ID, SCHOOL_ID, SCORE_PUBLISH_STATUS, LIST_PUBLISH_STATUS, TYPE, IS_RESET, CREATETIME, MODIFYTIME, CREATEUSER, MODIFYUSER, REMARK ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scorePublishStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{listPublishStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isReset,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into score_grade_physical ( ID, STUDENT_ID, GRADE, RESULT, PROJECT_ID, POSITION_ID, SCHOOL_ID, SCORE_PUBLISH_STATUS, LIST_PUBLISH_STATUS, TYPE, IS_RESET, CREATETIME, MODIFYTIME, CREATEUSER, MODIFYUSER, REMARK )
select sys_guid(), #{item.studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.positionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.schoolId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.scorePublishStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.listPublishStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isReset,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, systimeStamp, #{item.modifytime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.modifyuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual
mapper.update:
update score_grade_physical
ID=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDENT_ID=#{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRADE=#{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESULT=#{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_ID=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSITION_ID=#{positionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCHOOL_ID=#{schoolId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCORE_PUBLISH_STATUS=#{scorePublishStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LIST_PUBLISH_STATUS=#{listPublishStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE=#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_RESET=#{isReset,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME=#{createtime,jdbcType=DATE},
MODIFYTIME=#{modifytime,jdbcType=DATE},
CREATEUSER=#{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFYUSER=#{modifyuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK=#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update.foreach:
update score_grade_physical
MODIFYUSER=#{item.modifyuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESULT=#{item.result,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFYTIME=systimeStamp
where ID = #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR};

mapper.select:
select
from score_grade_physical where 1=1
AND ID IN
#{item}
